text: Sofia Ennaoui (born 30 August 1995 in Ben Guerir, Morocco) is a Polish athlete competing in the middle-distance running events. She won silver medals at the 2013 European Junior Championships, 2015 European U23 Championships and at the 2018 European Championships. In addition, she is the current European junior record holder in the indoor 3000 metres. She was born to a Moroccan father and a Polish mother and moved to Poland at the age of 2.Prague 2015 bios ==Competition record== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2011 |World Youth Championships
